items.question: Is the app complicated to use?
items.answer: Not at all! You enter your license plate, take photos of your documents, and AUTYVO organizes them automatically. It's quick and very simple.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. Your information is protected and we comply with GDPR. You always keep control: you decide when and with whom to share your AUTYVO Trace.

items.question: Can I use AUTYVO for an old vehicle?
items.answer: Of course! AUTYVO works for all vehicles, old or recent. The more complete your history, the more value your vehicle gains.

items.question: How does the app know when I need maintenance?
items.answer: AUTYVO automatically calculates your next deadlines (oil change, technical inspection, etc.) based on your model and mileage. You receive a reminder at the right time.

items.question: Does AUTYVO Trace really help me sell more easily?
items.answer:
Yes. A clear, complete, and verified AUTYVO Trace immediately reassures a buyer. They see the maintenance, mileage, and real history of your vehicle. They know what they're buying, which creates trust.
And rest assured: you have complete control over what you share.

items.question: Is AUTYVO free?
items.answer: The app is free for your daily management. You can also create your first AUTYVO Trace for free to see your history.

items.question: Why is your history more reliable than a simple paper folder?
items.answer: Because AUTYVO verifies your information with official government data. Your file is clear, reliable, and has no surprises.
